messages.content:

The new item will be sent to you according to the store's exchange policy, which may involve sending the new item after the original is received or simultaneously.

Regarding the gift card balance, the refund for the price difference will be updated immediately on your gift card.

Regarding the return timeframe for the exchange, the specific return window and instructions will be provided in the email you receive after the exchange request is processed. message.content: Oh, that's a bit confusing. So, if I cancel the current exchange and start a new one, will I lose the gift card balance or the refund amount that was supposed to go back to the gift card? Also, will the return instructions change if I start a new exchange?

messages.content:
If you cancel the current exchange and start a new one, the gift card balance will not be lost. Any refund amount that was supposed to go back to the gift card from the previous exchange will be retained and available for use in the new exchange.

Regarding the return instructions, if you start a new exchange, you will receive updated return instructions specific to the new exchange request. These instructions may differ from the previous ones, so it's important to follow the latest instructions you receive.
